title: Buy a one-year Costco membership for $65, get a $20 Shop Card
description: Save on everything from Apple Watches and MacBooks to tires and rotisserie chickens with this Costco membership deal. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Save on everything from Apple Watches and MacBooks to tires and rotisserie chickens with this Costco membership deal.
text: Daily deals You can save on everything from groceries to Apple gear at Costco. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals A Costco Gold Star Membership can help you secure high-quality goods — including iPhones, Macs, Apple Watches and iPads — at bargain-basement prices. You can hop on the savings train now with a Costco membership deal that lets you join the warehouse club for less. Right now, you can pick up a year-long Costco Gold Star Membership for only $65. You’ll also score a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card*! Enjoy great value from a Costco Gold Star Membership deal You can find incredible value at any one of Costco’s more than 500 warehouse locations. You will discover savings on groceries, electronics, household goods and more. Cult of Mac readers may especially enjoy Costco’s impressive offering of Apple products, as well as other top-shelf products from the likes of Dyson, KitchenAid and LG. Plus, you can pay with Apple Pay at Costco warehouses. Excellent perks in addition to great selection and prices Aside from finding great deals on a variety of high-quality goods, Costco Gold Star Members can take advantage of other perks. While shopping at a Costco warehouse, you can have brand-name tires installed on your vehicle at the Costco Tire Center. And before you leave, you can top up your car with gasoline from the Costco gas station. (Services availability varies by location.) Planning to travel in 2024? This Costco membership deal can help you save on exciting adventures. That’s because becoming a Costco Gold Star Member opens access to Costco Travel, which can help you find more affordable cruises, vacation packages and much more. Whether you’re looking to travel domestically or abroad, Costco Travel can help you find better value. In addition to shopping in person, a Costco Gold Star Membership allows you to shop on Costco.com. If you’re crunched for time, you can order groceries and other essentials online. Enjoy same-day or two-day delivery with a Costco Gold Star Membership. Save on a Costco membership with a $20 gift card Fulfill all your shopping needs under one roof with this Costco membership deal. Get a one-year Costco Gold Star Membership and a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* for just $65 for a limited time. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals *To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card with this Costco membership deal, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within two weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $65 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $65 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary. Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this Costco membership deal post on November 27, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
html:
• Daily deals

A Costco Gold Star Membership can help you secure high-quality goods — including iPhones, Macs, Apple Watches and iPads — at bargain-basement prices. You can hop on the savings train now with a Costco membership deal that lets you join the warehouse club for less.

Right now, you can pick up a year-long Costco Gold Star Membership for only $65. You’ll also score a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card*!

Enjoy great value from a Costco Gold Star Membership deal

You can find incredible value at any one of Costco’s more than 500 warehouse locations. You will discover savings on groceries, electronics, household goods and more.

Cult of Mac readers may especially enjoy Costco’s impressive offering of Apple products, as well as other top-shelf products from the likes of Dyson, KitchenAid and LG. Plus, you can pay with Apple Pay at Costco warehouses.

Excellent perks in addition to great selection and prices

Aside from finding great deals on a variety of high-quality goods, Costco Gold Star Members can take advantage of other perks. While shopping at a Costco warehouse, you can have brand-name tires installed on your vehicle at the Costco Tire Center. And before you leave, you can top up your car with gasoline from the Costco gas station. (Services availability varies by location.)

Planning to travel in 2024? This Costco membership deal can help you save on exciting adventures. That’s because becoming a Costco Gold Star Member opens access to Costco Travel, which can help you find more affordable cruises, vacation packages and much more. Whether you’re looking to travel domestically or abroad, Costco Travel can help you find better value.

In addition to shopping in person, a Costco Gold Star Membership allows you to shop on Costco.com. If you’re crunched for time, you can order groceries and other essentials online. Enjoy same-day or two-day delivery with a Costco Gold Star Membership.

Save on a Costco membership with a $20 gift card

Fulfill all your shopping needs under one roof with this Costco membership deal. Get a one-year Costco Gold Star Membership and a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* for just $65 for a limited time.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card with this Costco membership deal, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion.

New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within two weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $65 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $65 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this Costco membership deal post on November 27, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
